page.title: 20 Weaverthorpe Survey
page.content: The Upper Class of{Weaverthorpe {Primary School}did this{survey.}They are:-Lesley-Anne and Philip Cook, Claire and Dean Ireland, Paul Armstrong, James Clarke, Beverley and Maxine Woodall, Gary and Duncan Kirby, Jason Ireland, John Hildreth, Darren Wood, Karen and Claire Dobson, Martin Pratt, Keith Rex, Stella Metcalfe, David Owen and Charmaine Taylor. 8 are in J4 and will leave this term for {Norton School,}4 are J3,leaving next year and 8 are J2 with 2 years to go.8 of us live in Weaverthorpe,3 have just moved from there,2 to Potter Brompton to start a new farm, and 1 to W.Lutton 6 live in Helperthorpe and 2 in Butter -wick. Besides the 5 pairs,the Rex and Kirby family and the Ireland family are{double cousins}(1 set of parents are siblings of the other set). No others are{closely related.
